thread.title: PepsiCo Buys Bare Foods, Maker of Fruit and Vegetable Snacks

author: Aisha Al-Muslim
title: PepsiCo Buys Bare Foods, Maker of Fruit and Vegetable Snacks

organizations.name: maker of fruit and vegetable snacks pepsico inc.

text:
PepsiCo Inc. said Friday it is buying Bare Foods Co., a maker of fruit and vegetable snacks, as the global food and beverage company looks to expand its offerings of healthier fare.
The deal unites the owner of Lays and Doritos snacks with a San Francisco-based startup that sells baked fruit and vegetable chips. Terms of the deal werenâ€™t disclosed.
